title: Whittier
name: Uptown Whittier
content: Uptown Whittier is the traditional shopping district of Whittier.  It contains many restaurants and specialty stores, such as the candy shop Village Sweets and the soap shop Pour Le Bain.  Most of the businesses are located on Greenleaf Avenue between Hadley and Mar Vista Streets, and on Philadelphia Street between Pickering and Painter Avenues.
